content.html: Shell's obscene £32,200,000,000 profits reminds us it's not a cost-of-living crisis because there's not enough wealth. It's a cost-of-living crisis because the super-rich have hoarded all the wealth.
content.value:
Shell's obscene £32,200,000,000 profits reminds us it's not a cost-of-living crisis because there's not enough wealth.

It's a cost-of-living crisis because the super-rich have hoarded all the wealth.
